title: ISic001393. I.Sicily inscription 001393
body:
Facsimile Images

1[.]ΠΙΗΡΑΚΛΕΙΟΥΤΟΥΑ[---]
2[---]Ο.ΑΡΙΣΤΟΝΙΚΟΥ
3ΔΙΙΩΡΙΩΑΝΦΙΠΟΛΕΥΣΑΣ
4[..].ΕΜΙΣΚΟΣΝΥΜ.ΩΝΟΣ
5ΚΑΒΑΛΛΟΣΕΚΤΩΝΑΥΤΟΥ

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after IG and Manganaro, from antiquarian edition;
  • 2: apographs read: [---]ΟΓ at line beginning.
  • 4: apographs read: [---]ΙΕΜ at line beginning; apographs read: ΝΥΜΡΩΝΟΣ
  • 5: apographs read: ΚΑΒΑΜΟΣ (correction goes back to Kaibel)

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0574 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 1964.0615 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001282

  • 5248 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000817
  • Ansaldi 1851 50 no. 5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002182
  • Manganaro 1963 51 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001850
  • Cappelletti 2020 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002340
  • Tusa 1963 189 no. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001540
